description: Mechanical engineering major from Alpharetta. Fall '13 AM Class. Like FC Barcelona, NY Yankees.
aspects: I love Lambda Chi most for its diversity. It is the broadest spectrum of personalities I have seen anywhere which makes for an interesting dynamic. This dynamic keeps us rolling and always keeps things interesting. It means everyone will constantly challenge you to improve in different areas. This challenge is why I joined Lambda Chi and will be an active participant for years to come.
quotes: "As our circle of knowledge increases, so does the circumference of darkness surrounding it."
name: Zandy Rizzo
